VIII.iii.7.D.1.b
.
Determining the DC When Rating Disabilities Caused by Exposure to Asbestos
Use the information below to determine the diagnostic code (DC) to assign when rating disabilities caused by exposure to asbestos.
If the condition is …
Then rate …
asbestosis
under
38 CFR 4.97, DC 6833
.
pleural effusions
fibrosis, or
pleural plaques
analogous to asbestosis under
38 CFR 4.97, DC 6833
.
cancer
under the DC for the appropriate body system.
mesothelioma of pleura
analogous to
38 CFR 4.97, DC 6819
.
mesothelioma of peritoneum
analogous to
38 CFR 4.114, DC 7343
.
